TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PersonalizationLink extends Microsoft.Office.Server.UserProfiles.PrivacyItem

Docs.summary: Provides methods and properties to add, delete, retrieve, set, change, and manage personalization links and represents a link to a Personalization Site that is displayed on the navigation bar of the user's My Site.

remarks.para: For more information about personalization, see Personalizing Your Portal: Overview and My Site Overview.

For more information about privacy policies, see Privacy Policies and Writing Policy-Compliant Code. For a code example about how to set the privacy policy of a property, see How to: Set Privacy Policies for User Profile Properties.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property IsEditable As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsEditable { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns a Boolean value that specifies whether a personalization link can be edited.
Docs.value: If a personalization link is editable, true; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: For more information about personalization, see Personalizing Your Portal: Overview and My Site Overview.

Docs.summary: Returns a Boolean value that specifies whether a personalization link URL can be edited.
